column3: Suggestion, rename PR and commit to `Refactor fRelayTxes global to CConnman member`
@promag thx for the review. I rewrote the commit msg as you suggested.
Err.. I'd rather not, as this really needs to be a member of the message processor instead. We'll likely start moving in that direction after #10756 goes in.\n\n@TheBlueMatt agreed?
Yea, we should be moving fRelayTxes towards net_processing, not net, sorry for the churn in this area.

Mostly because of this: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/10596#discussion_r128319151\n\nPersonally, I also slightly prefer to put the correct default here, but it does not matter much as it gets overwritten anyway.
Is it needed? It gets set during `Start()` and isn't used before. Or is it a matter of good form?
Some future refactor can call `GetRelayTxes` (or other) before `Start()` and there is no way to know/prevent that.
